snippet: Coach Mike Woodson gave some of his veterans a breather, including Carmelo Anthony, who disclosed that he had taken a “huge risk” by opting against off-season shoulder surgery.
abstract: Boston Celtics rout New York Knicks, 111-81, in NBA preseason action.
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Woodson gave some of his veterans a breather, including Carmelo Anthony, who disclosed that he had taken a “huge risk” by opting against off-season shoulder surgery.

headline.main: Knicks, Without Anthony, Struggle in Preseason Loss to Celtics
